member.name: M:RS3Tools.Simulation.correctGiansLackOfDatabase(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Created by Xavi just after Gian's departure (29.09.2013). Gian's reader of the pilot from SQL breaks because the separated input database for each stuff is empty, so I am creating this function to replace empty databases and setting the default input database instead.

member.name: P:RS3Tools.alarmSensor.alarmThresholds
member.summary: N thresholds -> N+1 responses. If currentVale is smaller than thresholds(0), the result is responses(0). If currentValue is bigger than thresholds(i), the result is (i+1).
